content.description: Title says it all. The topout is still really dirty, so I haven't bothered actually topping it since I just warm up on this.
content.protection: One pad is fine, or two if you want protection for the low traverse
content.location: Stand-start from one of the slots on the right near the huge crack, but it doesn't really matter. Traverse left until the holds trend upwards.

content.description: Moves are basic at the bottom, but it leads to a pretty tricky topout.
content.protection: One pad with a spotter suffices, or two pads
content.location: Start on the low jug rail on the left side of the arete, then work slightly right as you go up. Top out using the rounded boulder sticking out on the left.

content.description: So far a great place for warming up, but with some cleaning there is potential for harder lines.
